creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: abstract imagery with symbols, shapes, and text throughout; pale orange triangles around L, UL, and R sides; large, red drip shape on R; white background at center with yellow, orange and red shapes, gray splatters and streaks, and sinuous black lines evoking a face; smaller face at LC, below brown text; pink and blue spray painted text along bottom, above red and blue alternating text
markings: verso ULC in black: oil on canvas/2016/48 x 48 | verso RC and LRC printed white gallery labels
signed: verso ULC in black: Brad Kahlhamer | verso ULC in black: FORT GOTHAM 646 FORT GOTHAM 646 | verso ULC in black: 2016
title: Fort Gotham 646
